name: itemGetBackendAssetUrl

type.rawType: (config: { item: import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/types/model-types/build/any-model").AugmentedAnyModelType; backendAsset?: import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/asset/asset-type/build/BackendAsset").BackendAsset | import("/Users/king/King/operations/tools/asset/asset-type/build/BackendAsset").BackendAsset[] | undefined; isDownload?: boolean | undefined; }) => string | undefined

description:
